entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 7.7°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %

Wind: S 9 km/h
